channel.title: [PI/DSPK] Invalid integers cause disconnections
channel.description:
I'm using a base that was made with PI/DSPK and I would like to fix as many random DCs as possible.
Firstly, I haven't seen a single DC that doesn't have something to do with an invalid integer.
So what I think I need to do is find where this is happening and make it to where when an invalid integer is entered/processed instead of disconnecting the player and throwing an error, it simply does nothing.
I'm not exactly sure of everything that causes this but an example is someone using "Bank X" and typing a number higher than 2147M.
If anyone can guide me to which classes I may need to edit, or what code I might need to use to fix this, please do. I will rep++. Thanks.
Edit: It can also be caused sometimes from entering letters for withdrawing/depositing things. Is there someway to make the server automatically return/disregard when the NumberFormatException is thrown?
